title: Voices of the Energy Industry: Bobbi Harris utilizes communications and connection to defines the utility journey
description: Bobbi Harris leads the Utility Broadband Alliance, also known as UBBA, which connects over 115 companies to address utility broadband infrastructure challenges.
content: Bobbi Harris leads the Utility Broadband Alliance, also known as UBBA, which connects over 115 companies to address utility broadband infrastructure challenges.
